name: Web Design
description: Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for clients. Working with different content management systems. Communicating design ideas using user flows, process flows, site maps, and wireframes.

name: App Development
description: Developing software solutions to meet customer needs. Creating and implementing the source code of new applications. Testing source code and debugging code. Evaluating existing applications and performing updates and modifications.

name: DevOps
